body_html: @SeanNaren I am trying to use the CTC loss, but I am not very clear how to fill the labels tensor. If I have three label sequences seq1, seq2, seq3, thay have different length L1, L2, L3, should the elements in the labels tensor follow the order [seq1[0:L1], seq2[0:L2], seq3[0:L3]], or [seq1[0], seq2[0], seq3[0], seq1[1], seq2[1], seq3[1]...]? Also, I noticed that the labels never have zero? Is zero reserved for the blank label?

body: @SeanNaren I am trying to use the CTC loss, but I am not very clear how to fill the labels tensor. If I have three label sequences seq1, seq2, seq3, thay have different length L1, L2, L3, should the elements in the labels tensor follow the order [seq1[0:L1], seq2[0:L2], seq3[0:L3]], or [seq1[0], seq2[0], seq3[0], seq1[1], seq2[1], seq3[1]...]?  Also, I noticed that the labels never have zero? Is zero reserved for the blank label?
